issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.summary: Size of args cannot be less than zero in TraceAdmin#run as its linkedlist

comments.body: [~owen.omalley] can you assign this to me ?
[~Weisen Han] thanks for reporting the issue. I've just added you as a contributor so feel free to assign this jira to yourself and post a patch.
[~tonywei] submit the patch, could you give me a code review?

Good catch and thanks for posting the patch.
+1 pending Jenkins.

None of the findbug warning and junit test failing is related with this patch.
Thanks [~Weisen Han] for reporting this! A minor comment though, I believe {{isEmpty()}} is slightly more favorable than {{== 0}} performance-wise.

Thanks for your review, [~vagarychen].
submit the patch as you suggested.

bq. I believe isEmpty() is slightly more favorable than == 0 performance-wise.
Good suggestion, +1 on latest patch.. Pending for jenkins.

thanks to [~jojochuang] and [~vagarychen] for additional review.
